htmlBody: Thank you for posting, and thank you for doing the presentation. This is for me the best presentation on wild animal suffering addressing a vegan audience so far (with some other options being quite impressive already).
What do you think about having more of an EA presence at Vegan Camp Out more generally? I was there and was surprised not to see any of the big names I'm familiar with in the animal welfare movement.
Agree. I thought this was a fantastic talk. Really clear, well-structured and engaging. Nice one, Jack!
